title: Не приходи ко мне во сне
overview: Lesya and Veronica are sisters on their father's side, and more recently, best friends. Lesya dreams of singing on stage, Veronica helps her sister make her dream come true. But the fashion producer chooses not Lesya, but the liberated Veronica... Suddenly, misfortunes begin to haunt Veronica - people close to her die under mysterious circumstances. The girl herself gets into an accident and miraculously survives. Lesya discovers that she dreamed of all these misfortunes before and then became reality... Is she subconsciously jealous of her sister and going crazy? Or does she have a split personality and is a killer?
